information.description: The Tnufa track is designed for early-stage entrepreneurs interested in developing and advancing an innovative technological idea through a grant for initial R&D, towards proof of concept (POC) stage and/or building an initial prototype.
information.purpose: To assist in proving technological feasibility and business viability of the venture, with the goal of enabling private capital raising and/or finding a business partner for further development of the idea.
information.target_audience: Private entrepreneurs or groups of entrepreneurs who are residents of Israel, or companies (according to guidelines) operating in all industrial sectors.
benefits: Quality stamp investment: Tnufa investment allows entrepreneurs to examine project viability and reflects professional and objective confidence in the project's potential
Convenient terms: Entrepreneurs are not required to leave their current job or establish a company as a condition for receiving investment
No equity requirement: Entrepreneurs do not need to give up project rights or allocate shares to the state in exchange for the grant
Continuity at Innovation Authority: After Tnufa period, projects can apply for additional Innovation Authority grant tracks
eligibility_conditions: Must be an Israeli resident entrepreneur/group of entrepreneurs
Must maintain reporting, registration, royalty, and IP preservation obligations according to Innovation Law
Must be willing to repay grant through royalties if project reaches commercialization stage
Must conduct R&D activities in Israel
obligations: Reporting obligations according to Innovation Law
Knowledge and intellectual property preservation obligations
Manufacturing activities must primarily be in Israel
evaluation_criteria: Level of technological innovation and uniqueness of the proposed program
Level of challenges in implementing the proposed program
Applicant capabilities, including business and technological capabilities
Feasibility and ability to complete and implement the proposed program
Business-economic growth potential of the applicant due to program success
Potential technological and employment contribution to the Israeli economy
Grant contribution to significant advancement towards capital raising and continued development

questions.title: Applicant (Lead Entrepreneur) Details
questions.question: Provide details about the applicant
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- Fill in all fields in a structured manner
- Include full name, ID/business registration number
- Provide project/company name in Hebrew and English
- Include founding year, address, contact details
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Use clear, professional language
- Ensure all contact information is current and accurate
- Provide comprehensive but concise details

questions.title: Project Theme
questions.question: Describe the project theme in up to 8 words in Hebrew
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- Limit response to 8 words
- Use Hebrew language
- Capture the essence of the project
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Be precise and descriptive
- Highlight the core value proposition
- Use clear, impactful language

questions.title: Requested Budget and Timeline
questions.question: Specify the requested budget and project start date
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- Maximum budget: 250,000 NIS
- Include requested budget amount
- Specify proposed project start date
- Note: Start date cannot be earlier than the application submission month
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Provide exact budget figures
- Justify the budget allocation
- Demonstrate financial planning

questions.title: Project Partners and Stakeholders
questions.question: Provide details of leading partners in the project
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- If applicant is a company:
  - List partners with more than 4 shareholders in appendices
  - Replace "Lead Entrepreneur" with company role
- Provide details including:
  - Name
  - ID/Registration number
  - Phone
  - Ownership percentage
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Clearly define each partner's role
- Ensure transparency in ownership structure
- Highlight key stakeholders' backgrounds

questions.title: Executive Summary (to be copied verbatim to Research Committee's opinion)
questions.question: Present a concise summary of selected key project aspects
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- Include three key aspects important for committee members:
  [1] Project need, product to be developed, technology, technological and functional innovation, core development content, and objectives to be achieved with the grant
  [2] Relevant market, market validation performed, competitors, business opportunity, business model for raising funds
  [3] Other critical project highlights
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Limit to 15 lines maximum
- Use precise and clear language
- Capture the essence of the project
- Ensure the summary can be directly copied to the research committee's review document

questions.title: Project Need and Problem Statement
questions.question: Describe in detail the problem or need that the project aims to address
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- Provide a comprehensive description of:
  - The specific problem or need
  - Context of the problem
  - Current limitations or challenges
  - Target domain or industry
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Use clear, analytical language
- Provide concrete examples
- Demonstrate deep understanding of the problem
- Explain why existing solutions are insufficient
- Show the significance and urgency of addressing this need

questions.title: Product Details and Characteristics
questions.question: Provide a detailed description of each project product
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- For each product, describe the following three aspects:
  [1] Product Description and Need Solution
    - Explain the product's purpose
    - Detail how it addresses the identified need
    - Describe its unique value proposition

  [2] Product Components and Operational Principles
    - Break down product components
    - Explain technical components
    - Describe operational principles and mechanisms
    - Illustrate how different components interact

  [3] Use Cases
    - Describe potential usage scenarios
    - Explain current and future integration possibilities
    - Demonstrate product versatility
    - Show potential for future product development and integration
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Use technical yet accessible language
- Provide clear, logical explanations
- Include diagrams or technical illustrations if possible
- Demonstrate thorough understanding of product functionality
- Highlight innovative aspects of the product design

questions.title: Project Team and Capabilities
questions.question: Describe the following aspects in detail:
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
1. Provide background and relevant experience of each development team member
2. Describe the team's capabilities to implement the project
3. Detail any significant subcontractors (if relevant)
4. Describe advisors and project mentors (if relevant)
5. List investors, board members, or strategic partners
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Use clear and professional language
- Provide specific details about team members' expertise
- Highlight unique qualifications and experiences
- Be concise but comprehensive
- Focus on how the team's background supports project success

questions.title: Capability Gaps and Mitigation
questions.question: Describe the following aspects:
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
1. Identify gaps between described capabilities and those required for project execution
2. Explain how the project intends to bridge these gaps with grant assistance
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Be specific about existing capability limitations
- Provide concrete strategies for addressing gaps
- Demonstrate proactive problem-solving approach
- Examples of bridging gaps may include: subcontractors, knowledge acquisition, partnerships, etc.

questions.title: Institutional Affiliation
questions.question: Indicate whether among the applicants there is an employee of an academic/research/medical institution
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- Provide a clear yes/no response
- If yes, provide details of the institutional affiliation
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Be precise and transparent
- Disclose any potential conflicts of interest
- Explain the nature of the institutional connection

questions.title: Investor and Incubator Support
questions.question: Indicate whether the project has raised or is in the process of raising investors, and if it is supported by a supportive framework
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- Specify if investors have been secured
- Detail any supportive frameworks such as:
  - Innovation center
  - Accelerator
  - Technological incubator
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Provide specific details about investor involvement
- Describe the nature of support received
- Highlight how these frameworks contribute to project development

questions.title: Intellectual Property Rights Verification
questions.question:
Describe in detail the following aspects of knowledge:
[1] Has it been verified that the research, development, and its products do not infringe on intellectual property rights, including patents of others? How was this verified?
[2] Address the intellectual property rights of the applicant in the preliminary knowledge required to carry out the project and specify how usage rights will be obtained if they are not owned by the applicant
[3] Describe the use of third-party knowledge components, including patents, usage licenses
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- Provide a comprehensive assessment of intellectual property status
- Address each point systematically
- Include specific details about ownership and verification
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Use clear and precise language
- Provide specific examples of IP research
- Demonstrate thorough due diligence

questions.title: Patent Registration Details
questions.question: If relevant, detail the patents that have been filed or are planned to be filed for registration within the project based on current knowledge at the time of application submission
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- Create a comprehensive table with columns:
  1. Patent number
  2. Patent relevance to the project
  3. Registration date and status
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Include all known patent information
- Be specific about registration status
- Highlight strategic importance of each patent

questions.title: Ownership of Project Products
questions.question:
Describe in detail for each product:
[1] Are all property rights, including intellectual property, in the project's technologies and products, exclusively owned by the applicant?
[2] For applications with joint ownership of knowledge, address ownership details and agreements
[3] Address intellectual property rights in R&D products of subcontractors
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- Address each point systematically
- Include specific details about ownership arrangements
- Detail agreements and rights distribution
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Use clear and precise language
- Provide specific details about ownership arrangements
- Demonstrate comprehensive IP management

questions.title: Open Source Code Development
questions.question: If relevant, detail the code components that will be developed and returned to the community as open-source code. If not relevant, specify "Not relevant."
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- Clearly outline any open-source components
- Provide details about planned open-source contributions
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Be specific about open-source plans
- Explain the rationale for open-source development
- Demonstrate community engagement strategy

questions.title: Current Development Status
questions.question:
Describe in detail the development status and achievements with reference to the following:
[1] Relevant technologies and products existing in the project
[2] Objectives and goals achieved to date
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- Provide a comprehensive overview of current development
- Highlight key achievements and milestones
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Use clear and precise language
- Demonstrate progress and potential
- Provide specific, measurable achievements

questions.title: Technological Details
questions.question:
Address the following aspects:
[1] Detailed explanation of technologies to be developed within this application
[2] Key performance specifications of the product
[3] Assessment of feasibility and validation
[4] Technological entry barriers
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- Provide a comprehensive technological overview
- Include technical diagrams or illustrations
- Demonstrate technical depth and innovation
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Use technical language precisely
- Highlight unique technological aspects
- Explain complex technical concepts clearly

questions.title: Technological and Functional Uniqueness
questions.question:
Describe in detail the following aspects:
[1] The technological uniqueness and innovation at the basis of the project
[2] The functional (usability) uniqueness and innovation underlying the project
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- Compare proposed innovation with existing market solutions
- Highlight distinctive technological and functional features
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Use clear, comparative language
- Emphasize competitive advantages
- Demonstrate understanding of market landscape

questions.title: Development Challenges and Mitigation
questions.question:
Describe in detail the following aspects:
[1] What are the central challenges in the development process expected during the overall path and specifically within the Tnufa program, and how will these be addressed?
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- Provide a comprehensive analysis of potential challenges
- Outline specific mitigation strategies
- Demonstrate proactive problem-solving approach
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Be specific about potential obstacles
- Provide clear, actionable solutions
- Show strategic thinking

questions.title: Product Capability Development Tracking
questions.question: Provide a detailed table tracking the development of product capabilities
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- Create a table with columns:
  1. Capability description
  2. Current status
  3. Status at project completion
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Be precise about capability progression
- Demonstrate clear development pathway
- Highlight key capability milestones

questions.title: Project Development Tasks
questions.question: Detailed breakdown of R&D tasks
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- Create a comprehensive table with columns:
  1. Task number
  2. Task name
  3. Detailed task description
  4. Start date (mm/yy)
  5. End date (mm/yy)
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Be specific and precise about each development task
- Provide clear, actionable task descriptions
- Ensure logical progression of tasks
- Include specific milestones and deliverables

questions.title: Non-R&D Project Activities
questions.question: Detailed breakdown of activities that are not R&D
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- Create a comprehensive table with columns:
  1. Activity number
  2. Activity name
  3. Detailed activity description
  4. Start date (mm/yy)
  5. End date (mm/yy)
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Include supporting activities such as business plan preparation, patent registration
- Provide clear rationale for each activity
- Demonstrate strategic approach to project support activities

questions.title: Market Segment Detailed Analysis
questions.question:
Describe in detail the following aspects (specify sources):
[1] Relevant market segment targeted by the product
[2] Global annual market size and growth rate
[3] Market trends and developments
[4] Projected market share
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- Provide comprehensive market analysis
- Include quantitative market data
- Demonstrate deep market understanding
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Use credible, verifiable market sources
- Provide specific numerical insights
- Highlight market potential and dynamics

questions.title: Customer and User Characterization
questions.question:
Describe in detail the following aspects:
[1] Characterization of users and/or customers to whom the product is intended
[2] Characterization of users and/or customers who will be expected to pay for the product
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- Provide detailed customer persona analysis
- Distinguish between direct and end customers
- Demonstrate deep understanding of customer segments
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Use precise customer segmentation
- Provide demographic and behavioral insights
- Highlight customer value proposition

questions.title: Customer Interaction and Market Verification
questions.question:
If contact with potential users or customers has been established, describe in detail:
[1] Meetings conducted with customers to validate need and solution
[2] Feedback received from customers
[3] Degree of customer readiness
[4] Existing or emerging collaborations
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- Provide comprehensive market validation evidence
- Include specific customer interactions
- Demonstrate market traction
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Use specific, verifiable customer interaction details
- Highlight strategic partnerships
- Provide clear evidence of market potential

questions.title: Business Model and Revenue Streams
questions.question:
Describe in detail:
[1] Future revenue model for the product
[2] Planned marketing channels, partnerships
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- Provide comprehensive revenue strategy
- Outline marketing and distribution approach
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Be specific about revenue streams
- Demonstrate clear monetization strategy
- Highlight unique business model aspects

questions.title: Competitive Positioning Analysis
questions.question:
Describe the following aspects:
[1] Product category classification
[2] Existing approaches to addressing the need
[3] Competitive advantages
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- Provide comprehensive competitive analysis
- Compare product to market alternatives
- Demonstrate unique value proposition
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Use clear, objective competitive comparison
- Highlight distinctive product features
- Provide credible market positioning

questions.title: Detailed Competitor Analysis
questions.question:
Describe in detail:
[1] Competing products/solutions
[2] Competitive advantages
[3] Differentiation strategy
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- Create a comprehensive competitor table
- Provide detailed competitive analysis
- Demonstrate deep market understanding
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Use specific competitor details
- Highlight unique competitive advantages
- Provide clear differentiation strategy

questions.title: Market Entry Barriers and Mitigation
questions.question:
Describe in detail:
[1] Market entry barriers for project products
[2] How the project intends to address the identified barriers
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- Provide comprehensive barrier analysis
- Outline specific mitigation strategies
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Be specific about potential market challenges
- Demonstrate proactive approach to barriers
- Highlight strategic entry planning

questions.title: Grant Contribution and Funding Strategy
questions.question: Explain how receiving the Tnufa grant will enable the project to reach a significant milestone and detail the financing recruitment strategy
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- Clearly articulate the grant's strategic importance
- Provide a comprehensive funding roadmap
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Be specific about milestone achievements
- Demonstrate clear financial planning
- Highlight how the grant accelerates project development

questions.title: Royalty-Generating Technologies and Products
questions.question: If relevant, describe in detail the technologies and products to be developed that will generate future revenues
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- Create a comprehensive table of potential royalty-generating products
- Provide clear revenue projection
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Be specific about potential revenue streams
- Demonstrate potential for future financial returns

questions.title: Manufacturing Location and Value-Added Declaration
questions.question: Declare the manufacturing location and value-added percentage for each project product
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- Create a detailed manufacturing location and value-added table
- Address manufacturing for each product
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Provide precise manufacturing details
- Demonstrate strategic manufacturing approach
- Highlight local value creation

questions.title: Detailed Manufacturing Location and Value-Added Percentage
questions.question: Create a comprehensive breakdown of manufacturing details
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- Create a detailed table with columns for:
  1. Country of manufacture
  2. Product name
  3. Manufacturing essence
  4. Percentage scope
  5. Total manufacturing scope across all products
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Be precise in manufacturing component descriptions
- Provide accurate percentage calculations
- Demonstrate comprehensive manufacturing strategy

questions.title: Manufacturing Location Rationale
questions.question: If relevant, describe in detail manufacturing arrangements and reasons for location choices
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- Provide comprehensive manufacturing strategy explanation
- Address both local and international manufacturing considerations
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Be transparent about manufacturing decisions
- Demonstrate strategic thinking
- Highlight economic considerations

questions.title: Project Contribution to Israeli Economy
questions.question: Describe in detail the project's direct and indirect contribution to the Israeli economy
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- Provide comprehensive economic impact analysis
- Highlight broader societal contributions
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Be specific about economic and social impact
- Demonstrate project's broader value
- Highlight innovative potential

questions.title: Project Supporting Documents
questions.question: Provide relevant supplementary documents to support the application
questions.answer_structure_instructions:
- Organize and include all relevant supporting documentation
- Ensure comprehensive and clear supplementary materials
questions.answer_content_instructions:
- Include all necessary supporting evidence
- Demonstrate thorough and professional documentation
- Provide clear, relevant supplementary information
